content: skip 1 st on main piece slip_stitch 1 chain 2 starting on 2nd chain st single_crochet 1 back on main piece slip_stitch 1 chain 2 slip_stitch 1 fo ● thread end down the side of the wing hide ends inside remove st marker beak orange x1 crochet directly into the body through the sts marked on row 12 sts 6 and 7 start in st 7 top of chick s head facing toward you and chick looking up 1 start with slip knot on hook *single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1* in st 6 *half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 * fo ● hide ends inside remove st markers feet orange x2 crochet directly into the body through the sts marked on row 3 sts 5 and 10 each st will be a different foot 1 start with slip knot on hook slip_stitch 1 chain 3 turn 3 2 starting on 3rd chain st half_double_crochet 1 slip_stitch 1 on body fo ● hide ends inside remove st marker eyes black x2 sew on eyes in sts adjacent from beak it will be a vertical line going up one row repeat the same line 3 times hide ends inside ©2024aybeecreates chickenandchickcrochetpattern your chicken and chick is all done i hope you enjoyed crocheting them and found the pattern helpful i would love to see your finished project so share a picture on social media with me by tagging me @aybeecreates once again if you have any questions don t hesitate to reach out to me through email at aybeecreates@gmail com happy crocheting ©2024aybeecreates
